hero.p1: Our creative team will help you bring your idea to life.
hero.p2: With us, everything is easy and simple.

partners.mitc: Ministry of Digital Technologies of the Republic of Uzbekistan

our_mission.title: Our Mission
our_mission.subtitle: We want to make the world a better place using IT technologies
our_mission.p: Address local issues through IT and contribute to the development of our region. We want to utilize our knowledge and skills to execute projects and elevate the prosperity of the region to a new level.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.subtitle: We aspire to be the top IT company in the region
vision.p: Our primary goal is to create a community where everyone is united by a shared mission and values. We are open to all who share our vision. We aim for our company to be the best in the region, where our employees are happy and proud of their work, and our clients are satisfied and return to us again and again.

feature1.title: Build a company
feature1.p: Transitioning from a local leader to a global giant: Our ambitious goal is to be among the global leaders in the field of information technology.

feature2.title: Build a community
feature2.p: Peaceful allies of talents: Our purpose is to bring together international like-minded individuals and talents to create innovative IT solutions.

contact_us.title: Contact us
contact_us.message_min_length: Message must be at least 10 characters long
contact_us.success: Your message has been sent successfully
contact_us.error: Something went wrong. Please try again later
contact_us.reach_us_description: Your success is our goal. Don't waste time, contact us now and our team of experts will be happy to support you, solve any issues and help you achieve your goals together!

skymaxx.title: SkyMaxx
skymaxx.description: Сайт сделан для компании в Ташкенте по установке GPS мониторинга по всему Узбекистану

newera.title: New Era
newera.description: Сайт сделан для компании в Ташкенте по установке GPS мониторинга по всему Узбекистану

nukusavtovokzal.title: Nukus bus station tour
nukusavtovokzal.description: Сайт сделан по заказу ООО "Нукус Автовокзал" для своей дочерней компании занимающийся туризмом.

tashkenthotel.title: Tashkent hotel
tashkenthotel.description: Сайт сделан для самого лучшего отеля Нукуса. Гостиница находится в центре города.

intertravel.title: Inter Travel Nukus
intertravel.description: Веб-сайт сделан по заказу тур агентсва в Нукусе. С помощью этого сайта вы можете организовать путешествие по всему миру и по Узбекистану.

xuxo.title: Xuxo CRM
xuxo.description: Центр услуг Хухо. Через этот сайт вы можете пользоваться 16 видами услуг со скидкой. Помимо этого, сайт включает в себя услугу находить работу на заказ разным специалистам.

flytravel.title: Fly Travel
flytravel.description: Доработали сайт по требованию клиента. Добавили к ним система платежа по Click.

kodtime.title: Kodtime
kodtime.description: Доработали сайт по требованию клиента. Сделали слайдер и подключили ютуб. Немного изменили вид.

toybaslar.title: Toy Baslar
toybaslar.description: Сделали платформу по заказу «Toy Baslar» для рассрочки.

nawbet.title: Nawbet
nawbet.description: Our product is designed for automating enterprise queues.

biogumusfarm.title: Biogumus farm
biogumusfarm.description: Сайт сделан для компании по производству удобрений в Ташкенте.

xuxo.name: Aziz Adilbekov
xuxo.content: Hello, on behalf of "Xuxo Services" LLC, we express our endless gratitude to the programmers at Bizler Group. Thanks to the IT program they created, we have noticed excellent advancements in our work. We wish the specialists at Bizler Group good health and continued success in introducing new innovations.

skymaxx.name: Allayar Mambetkarimov
skymaxx.content: On behalf of "New Era" LLC and "Skymaxx" LLC, I want to express my gratitude to the specialists at Bizler Group. Thanks to the created websites, it has become possible to provide more information about our companies. I wish the developers at Bizler Group good luck!

intertravel.name: Jumagul Jalgasova
intertravel.content: "Inter Travel Nukus" JShJ turistik firması atınan "Bizler Group" qániygelerine aldaǵı jumıslarına tasqın tabıslar tileymen. Islengen  web saytı búgingi kúnde óziniń jaqsı nátiyjesin kórsetip atır. "Bizler Group" programmistleriniń aldaǵı jumıslarında áwmet yar bolsın. Raxmet.

services.web_development_description: We create websites of any complexity. We develop websites using modern technologies and frameworks.
services.mobile_development_description: We develop mobile applications for Android and iOS. We use modern technologies and frameworks.
services.design_description: We create modern and user-friendly designs for websites and mobile applications.
services.crm_description: We develop CRM systems for your business. Accelerate your business with CRM systems.
